Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. #10 -- 23 Mills - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE DISTRICT NO. 10 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE)

SUMMARY:  10-YEAR 23-MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICE FACILITIES, FOR PURCHASING FIRE TRUCKS AND OTHER FIRE FIGHTING OR EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICE EQUIPMENT AND PAYING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES INCLUDING CHARGES FOR FIRE HYDRANT RENTALS AND SERVICE, SAID TAX TO BE IN LIEU OF THE SIMILAR 5.05 AND 12.13 MILLS TAXES AUTHORIZED AT SPECIAL ELECTIONS HELD ON MAY 1, 1999 AND JANUARY 17, 1998.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 10 of the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a twenty-three (23) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $950,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities and emergency medical service facilities, for purchasing fire trucks and other fire fighting or emergency medical service equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service, said tax to be in lieu of the similar 5.05 and 12.13 mills taxes authorized at special elections held on May 1, 1999 and January 17, 1998?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. #10 -- $900,000 Bonds - BOC - 15 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE DISTRICT NO. 10 PROPOSITION
(BOND)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO ISSUE 15 YEAR BONDS IN THE AMOUNT OF $900,000 FOR THE PURPOSE OF ACQUIRING BUILDINGS, MACHINERY, LANDS AND EQUIPMENT, INCLUDING BOTH REAL AND PERSONAL PROPERTY, TO BE USED IN GIVING FIRE PROTECTION TO THE PROPERTY IN THE DISTRICT, TITLE TO WHICH SHALL BE IN THE PUBLIC, SAID BONDS TO BE PAYABLE FROM AD VALOREM TAXES.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 10 of the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of Nine Hundred Thousand Dollars ($900,000), to run fifteen (15) years from date thereof, with interest at a rate not exceeding eight per centum (8%) per annum, to be sold at par, premium or discount, for the purpose of acquiring buildings, machinery, lands and equipment, including both real and personal property, to be used in giving fire protection to the property in the District, title to which shall be in the public; which bonds will be general obligations of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and statutory authority supplemental thereto?
